english_example_sentence: On this difficult path, only those who continue can reach their goals.
russian_example_sentence: На этом трудном пути только те, кто продолжает, могут достичь своих целей.
turkish_example_sentence: Bu zorlu yolda sadece devam edenler hedeflerine ulaşabilir.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Bu zorlu yolda sadece ______ hedeflerine ulaşabilir.
